item.title: Sabrina Carpenter blasts Trump admin for 'evil' ICE video that uses her song 'Juno'
item.description: Carpenter joins Beyonc√©, Olivia Rodrigo, and others in demanding that President Trump and his administration not use their songs to promote policies.

item.title: USDA Sec. threatens funding cuts to blue states over alleged SNAP data noncompliance
item.description: The Trump administration threatened to cut off federal funding to blue states over their alleged refusal to share SNAP program data.

item.title: Appeals court disqualifies Trump's NJ prosecutor pick Alina Habba, rejecting DOJ challenge
item.description: The ruling affirming Habba's disqualification came one week after another Trump-picked prosecutor, Lindsey Halligan, was deemed invalidly appointed.

item.title: Costco sues Trump admin seeking tariff refunds before Supreme Court rules if they're illegal
